body_html:
fwiw while nvidia doesn't provide cuda9 docker images for 14.04, it's pretty simple to install cuda9 on a base ubuntu 14.04 image (or even take the cuda8 image and install cuda9 on it).
All you have to do is install via the cuda9 .run file and skip the driver install.

body:
fwiw while nvidia doesn't provide cuda9 docker images for 14.04, it's pretty simple to install cuda9 on a base ubuntu 14.04 image (or even take the cuda8 image and install cuda9 on it).
All you have to do is install via the cuda9 `.run` file and skip the driver install.
